title: Basic Call Recorder is a no-nonsense call recording solution for rooted devices
content:
Recording a call is often associated with risky business, but the feature is sought out for many reasons. A call recorder comes in handy when you wish to ensure that you don’t miss any vital detail during an interview or a business call without having to jot down things manually. The post Basic Call Recorder is a no-nonsense call recording solution for rooted devices appeared first on XDA.
description: Thanks to this Magisk module, you can now enable the call recording feature on any Android device running Android 10-13. Read on!
